30+ FPS is good but not great and hardly counts as optimized.

I can understand where the man is coming from it's not like this seat was opening up for anyone and his little switch-a-roo while it may be against the Airlines rules is understandable and in this situation the Airline is fucking up.
You can be technical all day long but that makes you as much as an asshole as the airlines in this situation.
I'm sure you wouldn't want all rules in your life being applied this strictly to you.

You don't need to be a smoker to understand. Our mouths have two tubes, one for air and one for food/water.
When one is in use a flap usually covers the other to keep things from going where they shouldn't. With proper muscle control you can breathe in and then proceed to also drink using your throat muscles to swallow your liquid while holding the smoke in your lungs.
It can be a little hard and a little harsh but the more you smoke the less harsh it gets to you and the easier something like this becomes.
